text: Doi is a clan of the Gurjar ethnic group of Pakistan and India. Families related to this clan speak many local languages (including Kashmiri, Punjabi) and this clan is found in Punjab, Azad Kashmir, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and Islamabad regions of Pakistan. In India they found in Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Jammu and Kashmir, Himachal Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh and Dehli. They are a subclan of the Khatana Gujjars. ==References== Category:Gurjar clans
title: Doi (clan)
